Tutorial¶

Terminal¶

pychuck --help

Time Control¶

from pychuck import *

later = now + 5 * second

while now < later:
    print(now)
    1 * second >> now

Unit Control¶

from pychuck import *

# graph
adc >> dac

# main loop
while True:
    1 * second >> now

Example¶

from pychuck import *

# unit
s = SinOsc(freq=440)

# graph
s >> dac

# main loop
while True:
    # parameter
    s.freq = np.random.randint(100, 1000)
    # time
    200 * ms >> now

Custom Unit¶

from pychuck import *

# custom unit
class Noise(UGen):
    # generator
    def _tick(self, samples: int) -> np.ndarray:
        return np.random.uniform(-1, 1, samples)

# unit
n = Noise(gain=0.5)

# graph
n >> dac

# main loop
while True:
    # parameter
    n.gain = np.random.uniform(0, 1)
    # time
    200 * ms >> now

PyChucK
